name: Plattr — Streamlined Ordering Anytime, Anywhere.
description: lattr by University of Belize — Streamlined Ordering Anytime, Anywhere. For students, by students. From beverages to snacks, with Plattr, you can browse through a diverse menu featuring a wide array of beverages and snacks. From energizing coffee blends to refreshing soft drinks, and from savory bites to sweet treats, Plattr caters to a variety of tastes and preferences. The user-friendly app allows you to place orders anytime, anywhere, ensuring that your favorite items are just a few taps away.
